vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀχείμ, ὁ
Achim: Mat.1:14.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Mat.1.14;
son of: Zadok (G4524);
father of: Eliud (G1664)
§ Akim, "Yahweh is my brother"
Achim, (Proper name), indecl, Mt. 1:14*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞金 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華要建立"
基督的祖先,但是不見於舊約 (太 1:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚金 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华要建立"
基督的祖先,但是不见于旧约 (太 1:14)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-chim hoặc A-khim « Đức Chúa Trời là anh em của tôi », con của Sa-đốc (Xa-đốc). H3137
